name: 2DShooter AlienBlaster
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Tutorial Project.

There will be more modifications later next week. 

These modifications would include;

Change of enemy sprites (Straight Shooter, Chaser Enemy, Diagonal Chasing)

Change of player sprite

Change of environment 

The three most significant changes were the buttons, sprites, and the level. Specifically, these modifications include the change of enemy sprites, change of player sprites, change of environment/background, addition and changes to the level, some gameplay changes, and button changes.

The amanoeis-mac and amanoeis-windows are the modified versions of the game. 

Created By:

Eishi Amano
